name: Redead-ITA Presents: TIMERACE sim
description:
CONTROLLS

  • ENTER = START  
  • SHIFT = SELECT
  • Z = A 
  • X = B
  • ARROW KEYS = DPAD

Play my first proper game i ever made it contains a buttwhopping:

  • 3 tracks to play around, from race around or to time trial
  • 3 cars to choose from, they look different but they work the same
  • 2 secrets(hint: there is one in the menu before getting the prompt for a new game, it gives you a secret ending, the other is in the hub but that gives you dev commentary)
